changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `purchase` ( `id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `deleted_at` DATETIME(6), `updated_at` DATETIME(6), `created_at` DATETIME(6), `description` VARCHAR(255), `total` FLOAT, `name` VARCHAR(255), `status` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `client_id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL, `seller_id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`client_id`) REFERENCES client(`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`seller_id`) REFERENCES seller(`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=9 CHARSET=latin1;
